titleStmt.title: A dialogue bothe pleasaunte and pietifull wherein is a goodly regimente against the feuer pestilence with a consolacion and comfort against death / newly corrected by Willyam Belleyn, the autour thereof.
titleStmt.author: Bullein, William, d. 1576.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
